sections.text: Presumption of causation of injuriesNotwithstanding any other provision of law, in a claim for personal injury damages that is not raised pursuant to the Louisiana Workers' Compensation Law, the lack of a prior history of an illness, injury, or condition shall not create a presumption that an illness, injury, or condition was caused by the act that is the subject of the claim.Acts 2025, No. 18, ยง1, eff. May 28, 2025.
